accept_terms_and_conditions()

Clicks on the checkbox to accept terms and conditions.

click_continue()

Clicks the “Continuar” button.

This method waits until the button is clickable, then clicks on it. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

Raises:

Exception – If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period.

fill_address(address: str)

Fills in the address input field. :param address: The address to input. :type address: str

fill_card_number(number: str)

Fills out the card number field with the given number.

Parameters:

number (str) – The card number to be entered into the input field.

Raises:

Exception – If there is an error during any of the operations.

fill_cardholder_name(name: str)

Fills the card holder name field in the payment form.

This method waits for the loader to disappear, switches to the iframe containing the card input field, scrolls the card holder name field into view, and fills it using JavaScript. Logs all significant steps, and raises an exception if an error occurs.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the cardholder to be entered into the input field.

Raises:

Exception – If there is an error during any of the operations.

fill_city(city: str)

Fills in the city input field. :param city: The city name to input. :type city: str

fill_cvv(cvv: str)

Fills the CVV field with the given value. :param cvv: The CVV number to enter. :type cvv: str

fill_email(email: str)

Fills in the email input field. :param email: The email address to input. :type email: str

handle_modal_and_navigate()

Handles the modal that appears when the payment is rejected and navigates to the itinerary page.

If the modal is detected, the method waits for the modal to appear, goes back to the previous page, waits for the page to finish loading, and then navigates to the itinerary page.

If the modal is not detected, the method simply continues with the normal flow.

Returns:

None

load()

Load the payment page and handle page elements.

This method clicks on the One Trust accept button and waits for the page loader to disappear before confirming that the page is loaded. If the loader does not disappear within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

loader()

Waits for the page loader to disappear.

This method waits until the page loader disappears. If the loader does not disappear within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

scroll_to_element(pixels: int = 200)

Hace scroll hacia el elemento ubicado por el locator. :param driver: instancia de WebDriver :param locator: tupla (By, valor)

select_avianca_credits(number: str, pin: str)

Select Avianca credits and fill in number and PIN.

This method clicks on the Avianca credits checkbox, waits for the loader to disappear, then fills in the provided number and PIN.

Parameters:

  • number – Avianca credits number

  • pin – Avianca credits PIN

select_country(country_name: str)

Selects a country from the custom dropdown. :param country_name: The visible name of the country to select (e.g., “Colombia”). :type country_name: str

select_expiration_month(month: str)

Selects the expiration month from a custom dropdown. :param month: The expiration month to select (e.g., ‘3’). :type month: str

select_expiration_year(year: str)

Selects the expiration year from a custom dropdown.

Parameters:

year (str) – The expiration year to select (e.g., ‘22’).

Raises:

ValueError – If the year is not a two-digit number.
